CustomField.description: Updated the label on this firld to better match the re-brand from Acclaim to Credly and the purpose of the field. It is no longer for Retro badging, it is now for all badging. MB 2/22/22
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the date that the participant gave us consent to issue all retro badges.
CustomField.label: Credly Consent Date
